custom_critical_rules: Rust `unsafe` blocks - block any use of `unsafe` keyword without proper justification
Raw pointer dereferencing without safety guarantees
Use of `std::mem::transmute` or other unsafe memory operations
custom_warnings: Missing `#[derive(...)]` macros for structs (Debug, Clone, etc.)
Unwrap() or expect() in production code - prefer proper error handling
Clone on large structs - consider using references
prompt.additional_instructions: This is a Rust project. Pay special attention to memory safety, ownership rules, and lifetime annotations. Any use of `unsafe` must be thoroughly justified.
